resources.string:
Hello. My name is Ayush. I like to code and do fun things. 

The stuff here is purposely spaced so that I can test the ScrollView. 

This is also a way for me to test spacing in the emulator. Can I talk more this is the third 

time that I have to create more newlines so that it can actually do something 

for me to actually test it out. 

 

This is pretty useless ngl. 

OK we are almost done I just need a few more lines. 

Are we done yet? OK nice to meet you. Good bye.
